typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		PackageTypeName as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> odsDB
source(output(
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		PackageTypeName as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> intergrationDB
odsDB derive(IsActive = 1) ~> addingisactive
odsDB, Select3 lookup(PackageTypeID == SQL_PackageTypeID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 filter(!isNull(SQL_PackageTypeID)) ~> existingRow
Select4 derive(SQL_IsActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
intergrationDB select(mapColumn(
		SQL_PackageTypeID = PackageTypeID,
		SQL_PackageTypeName = PackageTypeName,
		SQL_LastEditedBy = LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom = ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo = ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive = IsActive,
		Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
existingRow select(mapColumn(
		SQL_PackageTypeID,
		SQL_PackageTypeName,
		SQL_LastEditedBy,
		SQL_ValidFrom,
		SQL_ValidTo,
		SQL_IsActive,
		SQL_Surrogate = Surrogate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
addingisactive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> intergrationPlusAct
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		PackageTypeName as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		IsActive as integer,
		Surrogate as long
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Surrogate'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PackageTypeID = SQL_PackageTypeID,
		PackageTypeName = SQL_PackageTypeName,
		LastEditedBy = SQL_LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom = SQL_ValidFrom,
		ValidTo = SQL_ValidTo,
		IsActive = SQL_IsActive,
		Surrogate = SQL_Surrogate
	)) ~> sink1
